componenttools.get_le_duration_prolated¶

abjad.tools.componenttools.get_le_duration_prolated(components, prolated_duration)¶
Assert thread-contiguous Python list of Abjad components. Accumulate components from list. Stop when total prolated duration just <= ‘prolated_duration’. Return (accumulated components, accumulated duration).

Previous topic

componenttools.get_duration_preprolated

Next topic
